metadata.title: CVE-2020-24187 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in ecma-helpers.c in jerryscript version 2.3.0,allows local attackers to cause a denial of service (DoS) (Null PointerDereference).

criterions.comment: iotjs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
